thread.title: Jets announce Bowles, Maccagnan will be back
thread.title_full: Jets announce Bowles, Maccagnan will be back

author: Mike Florio
title: Jets announce Bowles, Maccagnan will be back
text:
shaggytoodle says: Jan 1, 2017 4:38 PM 
That’s fine and dandy but the Jets are going to be going into the next season with the same question that loomed over them that ended up contributing to a poor season… 
Who’s going to be the Quarterback? a1b24312 says: Jan 1, 2017 4:40 PM 
Todd Bowles is a class guy and coach. Bowles didnt have a lot to work with this year. A QB with less of a beard might be a good start next year. 6ball says: Jan 1, 2017 4:46 PM 
. The Jets would best be served by cleaning house of the check cashers and starting fresh from scratch. It’s their only hope. . Pete Carroll is a 9/11 truther says: Jan 1, 2017 4:47 PM 
Bowles is a good coach who needs a QB. barrywhererufrom says: Jan 1, 2017 4:48 PM 
Bowles continuously makes in game blunders. His defenses are all hype. Once again I am embarrassed to be a Jets fan. Jan 1, 2017 4:49 PM 
Thank you! 
the other 3 afce teams BrassMonkey says: Jan 1, 2017 5:00 PM 
commitment to failure
